metadata.title: USN-6012-1 -- Smarty vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Smarty incorrectly parsed blocks' names and included files' names. A remote attacker with template writing permissions could use this issue to execute arbitrary PHP code. (CVE-2022-29221)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6012-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  smarty3 - 3.1.39-2ubuntu1.22.04.1 No subscription required
